name: Bona Fide Beauty Czech Glass Nail Files for Natural Nails (Clear) - 1Pc Crystal Nail Filer, Nano Glass File with Case Handcrafted in The Czech Republic
short_description: Genuine Czech Glass Nail File - a Bona Fide Beauty nail file for natural nails. Also known as a crystal nail file, this fingernail file can be used regularly to achieve strong and healthy nails. This nail filer is suitable for all nail types (thin, sensitive, thick, and more).

Salon Quality Nail Files - this clear Czech glass files feels luxurious and is comfortable to use on your own fingernails. Bona Fide Beauty Czech glass nail filers are the real deal! Made from real "Bohemian" crystal glass and manufactured in the Czech Republic. Achieve the salon experience from home!

Smooth and Shape with Glass Nail Files - unlike other nail files, Czech glass files can be used in both directions. Expertly trim and shape natural nails with comfort and efficiency. Start with a light pressure when first filing your nails, and increase pressure as you feel comfortable. With every filing, the nails edges become sealed and smooth.

Durable, Long-Lasting, Reusable Czech Glass Files - Bona Fide Beauty nail files are tempered (strengthened) so that this manicure tool will last a longer period of time. The high grit is part of the nail file body and is not sprayed on.

Made of Glass - Although tempered Czech glass is stronger and handcrafted with love and care, it is still prone to breakage if dropped or tapped against hard surfaces. Handle with care, and treat it like you would a favorite margarita glass.
